Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Five hours after starting the infusions , a study of the pituitary responses to LH - releasing hormone ( LH - RH ) was carried out .

Let's think step by step.

1. LH (luteinizing hormone) - a hormone involved in regulating the reproductive system
2. LH-RH (luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone) - a hormone that stimulates the release of LH from the pituitary gland.

These are the chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Chemical.

2. LH-RH (luteinizing hormone-releasing hormone)
